name: ShipFix LLC
description:
WE RECOMMEND PLAYING THIS ON YOUR PC!
The browser version doesn't work properly for some reason... There wasn't a time for that!

Take a role of an engineer in deep space and fix as many ships as it's possible in a limited time! Reach the highest score and show your engineering skills to the world.

The game was created in 2 days on the Global Game Jam event in Slovakia, Trnava.

Jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/shipfix-llc-1
